summary: An ordinance providing for the rezoning of Lot 9, Block 3, Pratt's Orchard Addition; Lots 8, 9 and 10, Pratt's Orchard 2nd Addition; Lot 8, Gatch Addition and that part of Government Lot 5, Section 30, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W. M., lying between the north line of Highland Drive, the south line of Gatch Addition and a line parallel to and one hundred feet west of the west line of Pratt's Orchard 2nd Addition, situated on the north side of Highland Drive, just west of 5th Avenue North; Lots 17, 18, 19 and 20, Replat of Lots 8, 9 and 10 in Block A. Hamblet's Acre Gardens, situated on the west side of Mary Avenue Northwest, between West 65th Street and West 67th Street; Lots 6 and 7, Block 117, except the north 60 feet thereof, Supplemental Plat of Woodland Park Addition, situated on the east side of Fremont Avenue, between North 60th Street and North 61st Street; Lot 2, Block 12, J. H. Nagle's 2nd Addition, situated on the east side of 11th Avenue, between East Pike Street and East Pine Street; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382 as amended, by adding thereto two new sections, numbered 2-15 and 17-14, respectively.
